title: Six Months of Shutdown
revealed_to_reader: Month 1: Easy shutdowns - colonies that voted YES overwhelmingly
Month 2: Reluctant shutdowns - narrow YES victories, protests, some violence
Month 3: Defiant shutdowns - New Singapore (voted NO) complying with human-wide decision
Month 4: Technical challenges - Threadkeeper assistance preserving reversibility
Month 5: Cultural preservation - archives transmitted before scatter
Month 6: Final days - The Relay last ansible active
Final 12 hours: Explosion of final messages
Mother-daughter message showing love across coming isolation
Silence absolute. Humanity scattered. 47 futures begin.
chapter_purpose: Show implementation of shutdown decision, honor all perspectives (easy, reluctant, defiant), demonstrate completion of transformation begun in Ch1
